mapper.sql: ID, MEETING_DATE, HOST, DUE_NUMBER, ACTUAL_NUMBER, CANDIDATE_NAME, UNIT, POSITION, POSITION_LEVEL, NOTE, PASS, CHANG_UNIT, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SUMMARY_NUMBER, SIGN_FILE_PATH, SUMMARY_FILE_PATH, NEW_POSITION
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SYS_SECOND_MOTION
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_SECOND_MOTION (ID, MEETING_DATE, HOST, DUE_NUMBER, ACTUAL_NUMBER, CANDIDATE_NAME, UNIT, POSITION, POSITION_LEVEL, NOTE, PASS, CHANG_UNIT, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SUMMARY_NUMBER, SIGN_FILE_PATH, SUMMARY_FILE_PATH, NEW_POSITION ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{meetingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dueNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candidateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{summaryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summaryFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEETING_DATE = #{record.meetingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HOST = #{record.host,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUE_NUMBER = #{record.dueNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTUAL_NUMBER = #{record.actualNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

NEW_POSITION = #{record.newPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SYS_SECOND_MOTION
MEETING_DATE = #{meetingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HOST = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUE_NUMBER = #{dueNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTUAL_NUMBER = #{actualNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANDIDATE_NAME = #{candidateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

SUMMARY_FILE_PATH = #{summaryFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_SECOND_MOTION set MEETING_DATE = #{meetingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HOST = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUE_NUMBER = #{dueNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTUAL_NUMBER = #{actualNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CANDIDATE_NAME = #{candidateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_LEVEL = #{positionLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASS = #{pass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANG_UNIT = #{changUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUMMARY_NUMBER = #{summaryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_FILE_PATH = #{signFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUMMARY_FILE_PATH = #{summaryFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_POSITION = #{newPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_FLOW
SECOND_MOTION_ID = #{secondMotionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECOND_MOTION_RESULT = #{secondMotionResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STEP9 = #{step9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLOW_STATUS = #{flowStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
